TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IStatefulServicePartition implements class System.Fabric.IServicePartition

summary.para: Represents a partition that is associated with a stateful service replica.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Fabric.FabricReplicator CreateReplicator (System.Fabric.IStateProvider stateProvider, System.Fabric.ReplicatorSettings replicatorSettings);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Fabric.FabricReplicator CreateReplicator(class System.Fabric.IStateProvider stateProvider, class System.Fabric.ReplicatorSettings replicatorSettings) cil managed

param.name: stateProvider
param.para: The with which the returned should be associated. This is often the same object that implements , but certain services might be factored differently.

param.name: replicatorSettings
param.para: The with which the returned should be configured.

summary.para: Creates a with the specified settings and returns it to the replica.

remarks.para: This method should be used to create a to service as the for a stateful service that implements .

summary.para: Used to check the readiness of the replica in regard to read operations.

remarks.para: The should be checked before the replica is servicing a customer request that is a read operation.

exception.para: This indicates that the partition object is closed. The replica/replicator/instance has either been closed or is about to be closed.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void ReportReplicaHealth(class System.Fabric.Health.HealthInformation healthInfo) cil managed

Docs.param: The that describes the health report information, such as source, property, and health state.
Docs.summary: Reports health on the current stateful service replica of the partition.

remarks.para: The health information describes the report details, like the source ID, the property, the health state and other relevant details. The partition uses an internal health client to send the reports to the health store. The client optimizes messages to Health Manager by batching reports per a configured duration (Default: 30 seconds). If the report has high priority, you can specify send options to send it immediately by using .

exception.para: This indicates that the partition object is closed. The replica/replicator/instance has either been closed or is about to be closed.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void ReportReplicaHealth(class System.Fabric.Health.HealthInformation healthInfo, class System.Fabric.Health.HealthReportSendOptions sendOptions) cil managed

Docs.param: The that describes the health report information, such as source, property, and health state.

param.name: sendOptions
param.para: The that controls how the report is sent.

Docs.summary: Reports health on the current stateful service replica of the partition.

remarks.para: The health information describes the report details, like the source ID, the property, the health state and other relevant details. Internally, the partition uses an internal health client to send the reports to the health store. The client optimizes messages to Health Manager by batching reports per a configured duration (Default: 30 seconds). If the report has high priority, you can specify send options to send it immediately.

exception.para: This indicates that the partition object is closed. The replica/replicator/instance has either been closed or is about to be closed.

summary.para: Used to check the readiness of the partition in regard to write operations.

remarks.para: The should be checked before the replica services a customer request that is a write operation.

exception.para: This indicates that the partition object is closed. The replica/replicator/instance has either been closed or is about to be closed.
